website_summaries.verdict: A great finishing touch for your chicken coop or shed.
pros: Adjustable clutch base fits the pitch of most roofs
Satin black enamel baked on for durability
Recommended for an 18 to 24-inch cupola, small garage, or garden tool shed
cons: Good on a chicken coop or shed but nothing large

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on our little chicken coop and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest Guy

customer_reviews.title: this thing is perfect. I love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Duck/Chicken Coop. For the money, this thing is perfect. I love it. However, you need to know that this thing is small and would not look right on a larger building. I have a 24'x24' pole barn and this would be WAY TOO SMALL for that. This thing would be perfect for a small shed, in my opinion nothing significantly larger than 10' x 10'. My coop is 4' x 10' x 8' high and this is perfect for it. I don't think you would hardly notice it on my pole barn however. So if you are dressing up a small shed, you can't beat this for the money.
customer_reviews.author: MessieJessie

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and painted with versatily for mounting, also- it looks reall cool
customer_reviews.text: The solid metal construction and evenly applied powdercoat make this item more than a simple decoration. The price of this item is on the low range of what these go for, but that does not indicate poor quality. The quality is very good, it was shipped securely and goes together in no time at all. The angle of the base can be adjusted to pretty much any roof pitch, and it could even mount on a thick post or 4x4. This adds a whole different visual dimension to our little backyard chicken coop.
customer_reviews.author: IWannaTalkToSamson

customer_reviews.title: Very Farmy Looking. Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: The product looks just like the picture. I was a little tricky to attach to the roof and there were not any directions that came with the product.The N,S,E,W letters stay in place and the chicken on the arrow rotates in the wind. It does need a significant gust to rotate the chicken. The Vane is black and looks great on the roof! It feels and looks like it's made of wrought iron. Very Farmy Looking. Good Product.
customer_reviews.author: FarmerDen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and is solid material
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my little chicken coop. Perfect size and is solid material. It was easy to install. As far as if it really works... I don't know because we haven't had any wind. The way the rooster piece sits on top, it really moves and spins easily so it seems that if the wind were to blow that it would work the way it should. But either way, I don't care because the point was to make my little coop in the city feel like the farm. Really pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: mesha

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and works well too
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this weathervane for our new chicken coop. I was concerned whether or not the 24 inch size would be large enough for the size of the coop. It looks great and works well too. It has held up to some pretty stiff continuous winds. Very nice product, a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mama is well pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Mama's "She Shed". She is "into" cockrels. They are everywhere. No live ones. Yet. Went on w/o issue. Sealed the bottom where it mounts to the roof. Probably over kill. But Mama loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Skip, W5UTWTop Contributor: Ham Radio

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and it is made of iron, heavy & durable. Took a while to get (about a month) but it was worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Aracely Alegre

customer_reviews.title: Great deals through Amazon Warehouse!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a discounted version of this through Amazon Warehouse. I guess it was missing some mounting hardware and the packaging was damaged. The product was a little scratched, but I plan on painting it anyways. It looks great and has a good weight to it. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable, high quality product. Easy to put together and install. I spray-painted mine pink and installed it on top of my chicken coop. Actually does turn with decently-strong winds. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP Metal
customer_reviews.text: A little over a year later and I go to make a simple adjustment and the metal breaks in half towards the base of the 4 directions. CHEAP metal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Private Sector

customer_reviews.title: Easy install & assembly
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very durable, so far. EASY assembly and install. Completes my garden/barn shed look.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Queen III

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Its on my chicken coop and everyone notices it and says something about it. Yes it serves no purpose buy it looks really nice and is made really well. I did not like the way its supposed to fasten so I drilled a couple of holes in it and screwed it down.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyRed

customer_reviews.title: This is a cute weathervane but it has it's problems ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute weathervane but it has it's problems. First, it's black so you don't see it very well. We've painted ours to make it stand out. Also, it's not very big. It took a lot of grease to get it to move. It still doesn't go with the correct wind direction. For the price paid though, it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: homemaker80

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This never did work right. Only stayed in one position so you couldn't see if the wind was from the north or south.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Thick metal
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Used for small chicken coop. Easy install, just a few screws and an impact gun and done in minutes. Thick metal, not flimsy or bendable at all. Pretty much exactly what I expected. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great weathervane at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put on the top of our chicken coop. Nice quality, easy to put together and mount. Very happy with the product. Bought as an Amazon Warehouse buy at a discounted price and was in perfect (complete) shape. Have had it up for a month now and looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper0702

customer_reviews.title: Cute worth price
customer_reviews.text: Great for price. Little tricky on install wish case with adapter if want to mount on square post or pole. But for price happy.
customer_reviews.author: RReiter

customer_reviews.title: If you want one, buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I put it above the gate at the side of my house. It needed something and this is perfect! Good quality and a great price. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: K. Troendle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for at a great price .
customer_reviews.author: Julie Strode

customer_reviews.title: Love my chicken weathervane!
customer_reviews.text: This looks great on top of your barn/chicken coop. Heavy quality metal, great quality build/weld and follows the wind flow accurately. I didn't want a traditional looking chicken and this looks perfect for my eye (whimsical looking but that's what I wanted).
customer_reviews.author: Love My Labs

customer_reviews.title: Works okay
customer_reviews.text: Works okay. Somewhat of a rubics cube to put together. Suggest a smoother system for the direction arrow to spin on. Greasing the arrow/pointer with grease may rust proof it, but it takes greater wind speed to move it. A low friction sealed bearing would be a start
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Smaller version of what is on farm barns!
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted one of these to put on top of rose garden stand we built. It looks great and works awesome. Made of heavy iron or cast iron? Not sure but it's legit if you are looking for one this is it. Also direction arrows moves freely in the wind! Very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1

customer_reviews.title: nice outdoor addition
customer_reviews.text: A grI'm always interested to see which direction the wind is blowing, this works well and looks good to.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount, exactly as described, sturdy construction. I put it on a large shed which is about 16x40 and it may be just a little small for that building but still looks quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: HTPickles

customer_reviews.title: Cute weathervane and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the top of the cupola on our chicken coop. I painted mine copper and it looks great. Very cute weathervane and great price.
customer_reviews.author: HYoung

customer_reviews.title: A Nifty weathervane
customer_reviews.text: I like this weathervane! It was easy to assemble and looks pretty nifty. I had to build a special base for it to use the angled bottom anchor pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Pat O. Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase. Very late getting to me. Went to install it and it was not plumb. So I put a little pressure on it and it snapped. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Riley

customer_reviews.title: Quality Weathervane!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED the actual product when it arrived! It was in EXCELLENT condition, came quickly and was EXACTLY as the description said. It will be perfect for our use! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: craftyamazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Chicken coop looks great now!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my sister who has a chicken coop - it's a nice cast piece. I'm sure it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: W.A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and works well
customer_reviews.text: l really like my weathervane, it picks up on the slightest wind change accurately and looks neat and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: K.K

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: very nice addition to my coop. Good quality and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Well made and a great addition any décor
customer_reviews.text: We put this on top of our chicken house. Well made and a great addition any décor.
customer_reviews.author: C Jobe

customer_reviews.title: Not Quality, but will do what I need.
customer_reviews.text: the price reflects the workman ship. the Black coating is already chipping off and I've not even installed it yet. I'll need to repaint before I install .
customer_reviews.author: Margaret I. O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and weight of this product. Fits our 10'x12' coop perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: love2sew

customer_reviews.title: Weathervane
customer_reviews.text: High quality product, as advertised and more, great company, awesome. Would definitely buy again and make it a point to tell all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Brown

customer_reviews.title: It was great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was great for the price. I added some paint in order to be able to see it against our surroundings. White to the letters, arrow ends, and some to the rooster, and of course red to the rooster's head.
customer_reviews.author: roberta

customer_reviews.title: Chicken weather vein
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with this product. It was as described and is now mounted on top of out chicken coop and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: swiss

customer_reviews.title: Simple and perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdier than i thought it would be. Will work great for my Chicken Coop. I haven't put it on yet so if i find problems i'll update but i like the look and the set up. Attachment for the roof is perfect for an A frame.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Estelow

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Lot more sturdy then I thought it would be ....great fir a small home or lawn shead
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Sharping

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great solid weather vein. Father in law loves it. Solid. Beautiful. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Anna Ames

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Solid
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Solid. Purely decorative and nonfunctional. You better know something about engineering to install (doesn’t come with directions).
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit where it had been planned to go, ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit where it had been planned to go, but will try to get it to work. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect piece for a playhouse in the backyard
customer_reviews.text: Perfect piece for a playhouse in the backyard. Easy to install and is a study design which should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Made my dad very happy !
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves it! It's durable nice looking and as described ! Great product !
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Broke at install
customer_reviews.text: The weather vein broke in two when I went to screw it down to the roof structure.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Henson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and looks very nice. My mom was very happy with her gift. Fit perfectly on to of an 8x10 shed.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Wilson III

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the quality. Wet got this to mount on our chicken coop. Super easy to put together and install. Great addition to the chicken house.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett

customer_reviews.title: Just like the old farm
customer_reviews.text: Just what I had been looking for ,swings cleanly with the wind.
customer_reviews.author: trevor bourne

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute for the price. Love it! Not sure if it actually works accurately but I bought it for the looks.
customer_reviews.author: kikibear

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking weathervane.
customer_reviews.text: This item was ordered for someone else and he seemed to like it a lot when he viewed it. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I expected. It is already in the top of the patio Wall.
customer_reviews.author: luz irene luna

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Came quick, easy to install on the roof of my small barn... Love it!
customer_reviews.author: M.H.O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to our Ramada. Sturdy and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mommo TC

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift and my friends loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and my friends loved it
customer_reviews.author: Ella Senter

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Decent product for the price. Easy to assemble and install. Made my Mom happy ...
customer_reviews.author: Gene Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product. Well made. Can't wait to mount it on my roof.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This item is very durable for the price. The attachment was not that clear at the time of purchase but you do have to screw it in so if you are putting on top of a building you will want to take note. We are going to attach to a post and save the roof.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Small weather vane
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my new chicken coop. The size would be perfect for a small shed too. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: CandyS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My mom hasn't put it up yet but she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: i like that it was sturdy metal that should last for years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect sturdy and a big hit for the stage
customer_reviews.text: perfect sturdy and a big hit for the stage set
customer_reviews.author: Robert I.

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and a great product. Looks awesome on the playhouse I just built for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: abc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could be better if they paint rooster like make red to ad more color otherwise it pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rothmond Tero

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my husband for Father's Day to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Father's Day to put on top of his new Chicken Coop - he LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Weathervane
customer_reviews.text: I do like this weathervane...strong metal etc. Found instructions lacking in detail - in fact thought something was wrong with it as it would not go together...however, I figured out how it would go together...despite the lack of adequate instructions. Did not put on a roof, so installing it was a bit more complicated than I expected. I think I will like it though. Just put it up today.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rouse

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The rooster was broken off when we opened it 😟
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived as promised, was in fair condition and worked as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Put this on my chicken coop and it looks great! Extremely sturdy and arrived quickly, I would def. recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: NSpencer

customer_reviews.title: It works,
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit slow to react unless the wind velocity is above the "breeze" level. After all, it is not expected to be precise, Otherwise.it looks good as an ornament.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Winn

customer_reviews.title: Just what the garage needed
customer_reviews.text: After researching many Weathervanes, I found this one, great price made me a little skeptical. Upon recieving it I was very pleased with its construction. The blacke finish is very well applied. It comes packaged fully protecting it in blister pack. Very simple to mount. Thinking on getting a second one for my other garage.
customer_reviews.author: G. B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected and here sooner than I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Candy ogg

customer_reviews.title: Really cool!
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality. The only small problems that I experienced were the packing, which wasn't very good (just the item dissembled on a cardboard board with plastic wrap on it), and it was a bit difficult to put on my coop, but it all worked out in the end. Fast shipping and cheap product!
customer_reviews.author: Ian W.

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our chicken coup. Would be perfect for small shack or barn.
customer_reviews.author: Tien D. Bui

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This looks awesome on the roof of my chicken coop!
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing on our chicken coop! Can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Roemer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic piece for the top of my new shed.
customer_reviews.author: matthew davies

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, exactly as I expected and is holding up well to the weather
customer_reviews.author: Springer

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for a small shed
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect size for a small chicken coop I built. it seemed to be durable, only time will tell. it had a nice finish. very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my mother because she has a chicken coop. she absolutetly loves it. mary b. gutierrez
customer_reviews.author: mary b. gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Economical Weathervane for Chicken Coop
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on top of our chicken coop and was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Sara McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Great seller... brittle metal.
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to receive my weathervane and while mounting it on top of my chicken coop, I applied a tiny bit of pressure to the mast to straighten out out and it snapped right in two. Be warned... this metal is very brittle and can not tolerate any pressure. That being said, once installed, there shouldn't really ever be any pressure applied to it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: but over all not bad,
customer_reviews.text: A little cheaper looking than I had hoped, but over all not bad,
customer_reviews.author: Arletta Jarrard

customer_reviews.title: We love this weather vane!
customer_reviews.text: The weather vane arrived quickly! It is absolutely adorable on top of our chicken coup. It is heavy enough to hold itself in position, but easy to remove so we can open the top of the coup to clean and retrieve eggs. I highly recommend this for small outdoor structures.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola V Schulten-Gaywood

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not what I though it would be but ok for the price
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk. Comes with a screw in one of ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. Comes with a screw in one of the directional arms. It DOES not stay together. What a joke. Sending it back
customer_reviews.author: ScottyC

customer_reviews.title: Top of chicken coop
customer_reviews.text: Was made extremely well, my only complaint was that the black blended with scenery and from a distance you can't see it. I am thinking of painting it another color so it shows up. Quality great, size perfect for chicken coop
customer_reviews.author: Carol Margies

customer_reviews.title: Weather vane
customer_reviews.text: For the price ok. It's lightweight but we're putting it on a shed so it will be fine. Time will tell on quality.
customer_reviews.author: swimalabike

customer_reviews.title: made out of some kind of poured resin metal carbide ...
customer_reviews.text: made out of some kind of poured resin metal carbide, broke just lightly tightening the screw...will look at flea markets to find one that was made of real cast iron...
customer_reviews.author: amahl h. lovato

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected cheaply made could not figure out how to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Fohn Bendele

customer_reviews.title: Inferior design and quality weathervane.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with the design and quality of this product. I didn't even bother to set it up. It went into the garbage dump right away.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman Liao

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The rooster is kind of small. It might be OK--haven't installed it yet
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Buss

customer_reviews.title: Sitting on a shelf
customer_reviews.text: This product came with not instructions and I can not figure out how to put it up. It baffles me.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still didn't figure out how to fix it up !

product_meta.title: Montague Metal Products 24-Inch Weathervane with Rooster Ornament
product_meta.description: 24" cast aluminum weathervane. Finished with a baked on satin black enamel finish for extra durability. This weathervane is recommended for use on an 18" - 24" cupola, small garage or garden tool shed. The clutch base is adjustable and will fit most pi.
feature_bullets: Adjustable clutch base fits the pitch of most roofs
Satin black enamel baked on for durability

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars227 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
